blank4_name = License Plate Prefixes | blank4_info = | blank5_name = Local Dialect | blank5_info = Northern Min | website = | footnotes = }} Nanping () is a prefecture-level city in northwestern Fujian Province, China. In 2020, 2,680,645 people lived there. It is part of the famous Wuyi Mountains range is in this prefecture. ==References== Category:Cities in China Category:Fujian
